scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy: cd .. && npm run build && cd functions && npm run setenv && cd .. && firebase deploy
scripts.deployhost: cd .. && npm run build && cd functions && npm run setenv && cd .. && firebase deploy --except functions
scripts.deployfunctions: npm run setenv && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.setenv: test -f .env-config.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat .env-config.json)"
